column2: Iran seeks more aircraft as questions linger over earlier deals ANKARA/FARNBOROUGH
column4: July 17 Iran has expanded its search for aircraft and is looking to order dozens more jets while it continues to try to overcome hurdles to deals worth some $50 billion with Airbus and Boeing
column5: Iranian officials and Western industry sources said. ~Boeing aims for supersonics and Mars at outset of second century SEATTLE The Boeing Co marked its centennial on Friday with plans to sharpen its focus on innovation
column6: including ambitious projects for supersonic commercial flight and a rocket that could carry humans to other planets. ~
